definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: How many of Gardner’s multiple intelligences are valued where you work?
sentences.chinese: 你的工作中體現了多少種加德納提出的多元智能？

sentences.english: Gardner to the shoeshine shop after joining the firm in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 2006年加入該事務所後曾陪加德納去擦鞋店。

sentences.english: Krausgarnter said he saw police "standing on the bridge and doing nothing".
sentences.chinese: 克勞斯加德納說他看見警察“站在橋上什麼也沒做”。

sentences.chinese: 2006年加入該事務所後曾陪加德納去擦鞋店。

sentences.english: For example, the owners of Gardner Peach Farms were fifth generation.
sentences.chinese: 就像加德納蜜桃場的主人已經是農場的第五代人了。
